title: Supreme Court Launches New E-Filing Portal
excerpt: A major step towards digitization of the judiciary.
content:
Supreme Court Launches New E-Filing Portal

The Supreme Court of India has unveiled its new e-filing portal, aiming to streamline the case filing process and reduce paper usage. This initiative is part of the broader e-Courts project.

The new system allows advocates to file cases from anywhere, 24/7, and provides real-time status updates.
author: Vakaalat News Desk

title: Bar Council Updates Enrollment Rules
excerpt: New guidelines for law graduates seeking enrollment.
content:
Bar Council Updates Enrollment Rules

The Bar Council of India has released updated guidelines for the enrollment of new advocates. The changes focus on verifying antecedents and ensuring practical training standards.
author: Vakaalat News Desk
